Instance.description: A tunable structure defining an interaction category for Club Rules.

TunableList.name: affordance_lists
TunableList.description: , A set of affordance lists associated with this interaction group.

Tunable.description: A reference to a AffordanceList tuning snippet.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: A set of affordances associated with this interaction group.

TunableEnum.name: category
TunableEnum.description: The category this interaction group should be associated with when shown in the UI.

Tunable.name: category_icon
Tunable.description: The icon associated with this Interaction Group.

Tunable.name: child_safe
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be associated with children when building ClubRules. If unchecked, we will disallow this.

Tunable.name: club_bucks_reward
Tunable.description: The number of Club Bucks to reward a Sim following a rule that encourages this InteractionGroup whenever the timer goes off. The tuning for how often the timer goes off can be found in ClubTunables.

Tunable.name: club_rule
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be used as a club rule for clubs.

TunableVariant.name: custom_schedule_enabled
TunableVariant.description: Whether or not this group is available at all for Custom Schedules.

Tunable.name: activities_rule
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be used as a scheduled activity for a role.

TunableTuple.name: additional_buff
TunableTuple.description: This buff is applied to sims adhering to this ClubInteractionGroup. It is removed when this is no longer active.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

TunableVariant.name: buff_source
TunableVariant.description: The tuning file that applied this buff. This is typically tuned to be the same file that this buff is being tuned on. This is NOT player facing, and is used for telemetry only.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: The tuning file that applied this buff. This is typically tuned to be the same file that this buff is being tuned on. This is NOT player facing, and is used for telemetry only.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.

Tunable.name: behavior_rule
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be used as a generic behavior for a timeslot

Tunable.name: shufflable
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be shuffled to in Activity Shuffle challenges.

TunableList.name: tooltip_text
TunableList.description: Mapping from the Pack to its associated tooltip strings.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A list of tooltips for rules for this interaction group.

Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: is_targeted
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group contains interactions that target other Sims. If unchecked, this interaction group contains interactions that do not target other Sims.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name for this interaction group.

Tunable.name: small_business_customer_rule
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be used as a customer rule for a small business.

TunableList.name: small_business_customer_tooltip
TunableList.description: Mapping from the Pack to its associated small business customer tooltip strings.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A list of tooltips for Small business customer rule for this interaction group.

Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: small_business_employee_rule
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be used as an employee rule for a small business.

TunableList.name: small_business_employee_tooltip
TunableList.description: Mapping from the Pack to its associated small business employee tooltip strings.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A list of tooltips for Small business employee rule for this interaction group.

Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: teen_safe
Tunable.description: If checked, this interaction group can be associated with teens when building ClubRules. If unchecked, we will disallow this.

Tunable.name: tooltip_template
Tunable.description: A template for the compound string representation of an encouraged Club rule for this interaction group. e.g. Flirt with {1.String} -> Flirt with Adults

Tunable.name: tooltip_template_negative
Tunable.description: A template for the compound string representation of a discouraged Club rule for this interaction group. e.g. Don't Use Alien Powers on {0.String} -> Don't Use Alien Powers on Teenagers
